original_title: 雀狼伝2 必殺！！亜空間殺法
overview: The second full-fledged mahjong drama presented with the full cooperation of the Japan Professional Mahjong Federation! The strongest rival appears. The most formidable rival appears. What will Ando Mitsuru do? Will the subspace killing method be defeated?
title: 雀狼伝2 必殺！！亜空間殺法
